Navigation
Name Rascal/Libraries/util/Resources/root
Synopsis Retrieve a full hierarchical representation of all resources in the Eclipse workspace.
Function Resource root()
Examples 
rascal>import util::Resources;
ok
rascal>root();
Resource: root({
    project(
      |project://ABC|,
      {
        folder(
          |project://ABC/bin|,
          {file(|project://ABC/bin/Haai.txt|)}),
        folder(
          |project://ABC/.settings|,
          {file(|project://ABC/.settings/org.eclipse.core.resources.prefs|)}),
        folder(
          |project://ABC/src|,
          {
            file(|project://ABC/src/A.rsc|),
            file(|project://ABC/src/Haai.txt|)
          }),
        folder(
          |project://ABC/META-INF|,
          {file(|project://ABC/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF|)})
      }),
    project(
      |project://rascal|,
      {}),
    project(
      |project://Test|,
      {
        folder(
          |project://Test/.settings|,
          {file(|project://Test/.settings/org.eclipse.core.resources.prefs|)}),
